document.full_text: a united nations plane crashed while attempting to land at the airport serving congo's capital kinshasa on monday, killing 10 people and injuring 16, a un source told reuters.
document.title: u.n. plane crashes in congo, 10 dead: u.n. source
lines_and_colors: a united nations plane crashed while attempting to land at the airport serving congo's capital kinshasa on monday, killing 10 people and injuring 16, a un source told reuters.
